name: Marriott Alpha
description:
Marriott Alpha Gameplay

Welcome to "Winchester Mansion: The Haunting"!

In this horror game, you find yourself trapped inside the infamous Winchester Mansion, home to the eccentric heiress Sarah Winchester. As you explore the labyrinthine halls and rooms of the mansion, you soon realize that you are not alone.

Something sinister lurks in the shadows, stalking you as you try to unravel the dark secrets of the mansion. Can you survive the haunting and escape the Winchester Mansion before it's too late?

Featuring immersive 3D graphics and spine-chilling sound effects, Winchester Mansion: The Haunting is a thrilling horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Controls : WASD - Move Shift - Sprint Left Ctrl - Crouch  E - Interact Right Mouse + Vertical Mouse Movement - Lean Scroll Wheel - Flashlight Adjustment
